description: After the installation of Microsoft Edge (Chromium-based) version 119.0.2151.97, users may experience unexpected crashes during web browsing sessions. This issue is particularly noticeable when accessing content that interacts with the affected Chromium components. The updates address CVE-2023-6347 related to a use-after-free vulnerability, ensuring improved stability for the browser in affected build numbers. Refer to KB article available at: KB-119.0.2151.97 for detailed release notes and mitigations.
